tool_description: Conducts high-magnification examination of paint surface, brushwork, and material details to analyze artistic technique and identify age-related characteristics.

focus_aspects.description: Specific aspects to examine (brushstrokes, cracking, particles, surface texture)

error_messages: Invalid artwork_id: Provide a valid artwork identifier from metadata record.
Invalid magnification levels: Use supported values like 10x, 50x, 100x, 200x, 500x.
Empty examination parameters: Must specify examination points, magnification levels, and focus aspects.
Microscope calibration error: Ensure microscope is properly calibrated before examination.
Insufficient lighting: Adequate lighting required for high-magnification examination.
usage: Specify artwork, examination locations, and magnification levels. Tool conducts detailed microscopic analysis of surface features and artistic techniques.

brushwork_analysis.description: Analysis of brush techniques and paint application methods

surface_characteristics.description: Detailed surface features observed at high magnification

technique_signatures.description: Distinctive technical characteristics that may aid attribution
